import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { GiftFormData } from '../types/gift'; interface GiftFormProps { onSubmit: (formData: GiftFormData) => void; } const GiftForm: React.FC = ({ onSubmit }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ gender: 'female', age: 25, personality: '', occasionType: '', minBudget: 30000, maxBudget: 100000, category: '', additionalInfo: '' }); const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); onSubmit(formData); }; const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: name === 'age' || name === 'minBudget' || name === 'maxBudget' ? Number(value) : value })); }; // ÎÇòÏù¥ ÏòµÏÖò ÏÉùÏÑ± Ìï®Ïàò const generateAgeOptions = () => { // Ïñ¥Î¶∞Ïù¥ (10-12ÏÑ∏) const childrenOptions = []; for (let age = 10; age <= 12; age++) { childrenOptions.push( ); } // Ï≤≠ÏÜåÎÖÑ (13-19ÏÑ∏) const teenOptions = []; for (let age = 13; age <= 19; age++) { teenOptions.push( ); } // Ï≤≠ÎÖÑÏ∏µ (20-39ÏÑ∏) const youngAdultOptions = []; for (let age = 20; age <= 39; age++) { youngAdultOptions.push( ); } // Ï§ëÎÖÑÏ∏µ (40-59ÏÑ∏) const middleAgedOptions = []; for (let age = 40; age <= 59; age++) { middleAgedOptions.push( ); } // Ïû•ÎÖÑÏ∏µ (60-70ÏÑ∏) const elderlyOptions = []; for (let age = 60; age <= 70; age++) { elderlyOptions.push( ); } return ( <> {childrenOptions} {teenOptions} {youngAdultOptions} {middleAgedOptions} {elderlyOptions} ); }; return (
